activities: RVM provides end-to-end legal technology consulting, data forensics and litigation support services. We likely to be exposed to receiving and/or collecting personal information from the EU on behalf of our clients.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech: RVM maintains a strategic relationship with Pivot Point security as a resource to investigate any unresolved complaints - in addition - RVM will mediate such conflicts in front of a panel with the American Arbitration Association (ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program).
